subject: Greetings Sir/Madam.
body:
Greetings Sir/Madam.
  Ref: US$7.5 Million USD Transaction.
We urgently need your Banking detail to transfer your fund ,Kindly send it with a copy of your ID with your telephone number .Note that you will be paid by MT100 Swift transfer (Bank To Bank transfer)
We look forward to hear from you.
Yours in service.
Ms Bestie Joe
Branch Manager
Commercial Bank of New York
Direct Line +1 928 265 5459

This fund is from the UNITED NATION it was sent out randomly to emails and
names of lucky people
through the commercial bank of New york and BNP PARIBAS SA of Switzerland.
during COVID 19
as a palliatives. Many claims have been made. so don't be left behind .


we are ready to transfer the fund to you now, send us your information to
confirm your name and to know
if truly you are one of the beneficiary., after that your bank draft and
fund release certificate shall be sent
to you ,
and you will provide your bank details  and the transfer will be done

thank you

subject: Re: Greetings Sir/Madam.
body:
Ref: US$7.5 Million USD Transaction.

Attention:amy

Thanks For your prompt reply .Attached to this email is your Bank draft
Check with your fund release Authority clearance certificate which we
received from the BNP PARIBAS SA of Switzerland .We are going to open an
online Banking account on your name and deposit in the Bank Draft there for
immediate clearance .

Once we open the account we shall send you the account user ID and the
Passwords with the Pin which you will use to access the account and
transfer the fund to any account of your choice.

All you have to do is to send us the sum of $500 only which we shall use to
open an online Banking account on your name and deposit the Bank Draft for
immediate clearance so that you will from there transfer the fund by
yourself to any account of your choice.you can pay the required fee through
bitcoin,or paypal,or zelle payment options

Thanks for your cooperation and patience all these days.While we look
forward to hearing from you positively.

Yours in service.

Ms Bestie Joe
Branch Manager
Commercial Bank of New York
Direct Line +1 928 265 5459

subject: Re: Greetings Sir/Madam.
body:

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. It's quite interesting to learn about this online banking account process.

However, I have a few questions that I hope you could help me understand better. You mentioned a sum of money required to open the online banking account, but it seems like the amount was not specified in your message. Could you please clarify how much is needed?

Also, could you explain more about the zelle payment options? I'm not very familiar with it and would appreciate some guidance.

Regarding the request for my banking details and ID copy, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing such sensitive information through email due to security reasons. Is there another way we can proceed without me having to provide these details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Amy
